name: Holor Media Inc.
description: Provider of augmented and virtual reality technologies intended to be used for video creation. The company's augmented and virtual reality technologies offer techniques and applications to facilitate the creation and distribution of video and deliver it to various platforms including desktop and mobile devices, enabling VR/Media creators to next-generation content.
